name: checker
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool url_checker_and_parser.
Tool description: Check if URL is live or parse and extract site meta data from any website using our free API
API description: Checks URL for their status - returns status code and message. API can detect broken links. API can be used to check if a web server is up or down

url.description: The URL of the domain to be checked.
